Programming
Top Programming Language JS

During the first browser war, Netscape had assigned Brendan Eich to develop a new programming language for its Browser. Brendan Eich had developed the initial prototype in only ten days, and the rest is history. Java Script is poor because of poor language design.

by Roshan Karki
Education
Top university of the world

I'm a first-year student at the University of Northampton (NAMI). Till now it seems to be a good university. Where you can get a proper education as per a Student of Computer Science this collage is the best. You will get the proper time for practice. For the better enhancement to your reading schedule they offer you the best teacher. The environment of the college is too suitable for the self-learner student. Moving forward to college facility it's beyond your imagination which is directly proportional to the cafeteria and other services.

by Roshan Karki

NEPAL
My View Of Nepal

Since, Nepal is a landlocked country, It is a developing country which is getting snail movement in development. Our views on roads to other building development our country never reached that high path due to the major problem of corruption. But the beauty beyond this concrete far away to the'90s. The building with soil and woods nor like concrete and rods whole the scenario was different than now. I would love to stay in that place where my imagination behold. The people with such a kind heart where there was no violence. People with people talk with a kind smile, where the relation of the country to their people is alike Mother nor like our generation where people can sell it for money. I love to be a citizen of our country.

by Roshan karki.
